top_issues: Heavy reliance on boxed groupings feels more iOS/mobile than native macOS.
Text hierarchy is flat; section headers and body text lack distinct weight differentiation.
Input fields span the full width, creating excessive white space and reducing readability.
top_fixes: Remove gray background containers; use whitespace and standard dividers to separate sections.
Increase font weight for section headers (e.g., Semibold) and ensure proper spacing (20pt+).
Constrain input field widths to a reasonable maximum and align generic actions (like buttons) to the left or right consistently.
quick_wins: Add a 'Check Connection' status indicator next to the ADB path input.
Ensure the window supports standard macOS shortcuts (Cmd+,).
